issue.title: [R] Functions for deserializing IPC components from arrow::Buffer or from IO interface
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3311](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3311). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See e.g. https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/python/pyarrow/ipc.pxi#L505
